column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////"Considered the oldest family name in Chicago pizza
column2: Lou Malnati's is as rich in history as its pizza is in flavor." After years perfecting his craft in other pizza shops
column3: Lou was finally ready to venture out on his own. On March 17
column5: Lou and his wife Jean opened their first Lou Malnati's in Lincolnwood
column7: Lou Malnati's has 36 locations and counting.
